incidents.name: AccSec API Errors to the Netherlands

incident_updates.body: Twilio AccSec API was degraded for 30 minutes between 09:10 PST - 09:40 PST Pacific Time on 12/18/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced issues with our AccSec API in the Netherlands. The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers have identified the issue with Twilio REST API and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue

incident_updates.body: Twilio Voice was degraded for 15 minutes between 11:34 and 11:49 Pacific Time on 12/18/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced higher than normal packet loss that may have impacted some calls using the AU1 home region or Sydney edge, degraded audio quality or calls failing to connect. The issue has now been resolved.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue on Voice Conference. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Voice Intelligence Operator Results Delayed

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting Flex CoPilot has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

Voice Intelligence Operator Results are processing without delay and only Flex CoPilot remains impacted. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. Any Flex customers using Agent Co-Pilot will be unable to use the feature. We will provide more updates in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Flex Co-Pilot and Voice Intelligence Operator Results are delayed. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. This is related to an OpenAI outage experienced globally. Any Flex customers using Agent Co-Pilot will be unable to use the feature. We will provide more updates in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Flex Co-Pilot and Voice Intelligence Operator Results are delayed. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. This is related to an OpenAI outage experienced globally. Any Flex customers using Agent Co-Pilot will be unable to use the feature. We will provide more updates in 1 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Flex Copilot and Voice Intelligence Operator Results are delayed.  The team is working on resolving the issue. We will provide an update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
